summary: When an abused socialite grows to giant size because of an alien encounter and an aborted murder attempt, she goes after her cheating husband with revenge on her mind.
cast: Allison Hayes|William Hudson|Yvette Vickers|Roy Gordon|George Douglas|Ken Terrell|Otto Waldis|Eileen Stevens|Michael Ross|Frank Chase|Tex Brodus|Herschel Graham|Thomas E. Jackson|Nelson Leigh|Philo McCullough|Lennie Smith|Lou Southern|Dale Tate
title: El ataque de la mujer de 50 pies
